directions: Stir together tuna, mayonnaise, green onions, red pepper, and balsamic vinegar in a bowl. Season with pepper and garlic salt, then pack the avocado halves with the tuna mixture. Garnish with reserved green onions and a dash of black pepper before serving.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can solid white tuna packed in water, drained
3 green onions, thinly sliced, plus additional for garnish
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
title: Avocado and Tuna Tapas
